pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Pareto, Piecewise Pareto and Generalized Pareto Distribution // Utilities for the Pareto, piecewise Pareto and generalized Pareto distribution that are useful for reinsurance pricing. In particular, the package provides a non-trivial algorithm that can be used to match the expected losses of a tower of reinsurance layers with a layer-independent collective risk model. The theoretical background of the matching algorithm and most other methods are described in Ulrich Riegel (2018) doi:10.1007/s13385-018-0177-3.
